translations.chinese: 子嬰誅滅趙高，遣將將兵距嶢關。
translations.english: Zi Ying executed Zhao Gao and sent generals leading troops to defend Yao Pass.

translations.chinese: 沛公欲擊之，張良曰：「秦兵尚彊，未可輕。
translations.english: Pei Gong wanted to attack them. Zhang Liang said: "The Qin troops are still strong. We cannot be careless.

translations.chinese: 願先遣人益張旗幟於山上為疑兵，使酈食其、陸賈往說秦將，啗 以利。」
translations.english: I wish to first send people to increase banners on the mountains as feigned troops, and have Li Yiji and Lu Jia go persuade the Qin generals, enticing them with benefits."

translations.chinese: 秦將果欲連和，沛公欲許之。
translations.english: The Qin general indeed wanted to form an alliance. Pei Gong wanted to agree.

translations.chinese: 張良曰：「此獨其將欲叛，恐其士卒不從，不如因其怠懈擊之。」
translations.english: Zhang Liang said: "This is only their general who wants to rebel. He fears his soldiers will not follow. It would be better to take advantage of their laxness and attack them."
